slack_webhook_url.description: The Slack Webhook URL to send the notifications to.

slack_channel.description: Optional: The Slack channel to send the message to.

event_types.description: Optional: Comma-separated list of event types to notify upon - eg. deployment_info,deployment_success,deployment_failed. See https://github.com/tobilg/marathon-slack#event-types

log_level.description: Optional: The log level for the log file output. Can be either error, debug or info.

cpus.description: CPU (shares) to allocate to the marathon-slack task

instances.description: Number of marathon-slack instances running on DC/OS

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to the marathon-slack task
